short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This addon removes all recommendations which Youtube offers (Sidebar/Endscreeen) == Focus on more important things in your life

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With the help of simple CSS I set the property display to none. So all recommendation's/ads for further videos won't show up anymore. If you don't want to use this Plugin anymore simply disable/remove it in the Chrome Plugin's section ... I hope you enjoy this Plugin... If you have questions or Feedback I'm happy to answer them.
